formulas.name: frm14DaysAfterCheckDate
formulas.expression: TEXT(YEAR({!dateDateToCheck} + 14)) & "-" & IF(MONTH({!dateDateToCheck} + 14) < 10, "0" & TEXT(MONTH({!dateDateToCheck} + 14)), TEXT(MONTH({!dateDateToCheck} + 14))) & "-" & IF(DAY({!dateDateToCheck} + 14) < 10, "0" & TEXT(DAY({!dateDateToCheck} + 14)), TEXT(DAY({!dateDateToCheck} + 14))) & "T22:00:00.000Z"

formulas.name: frm14DaysBeforeCheckDate
formulas.expression: TEXT(YEAR({!dateDateToCheck} - 14)) & "-" & IF(MONTH({!dateDateToCheck} - 14) < 10, "0" & TEXT(MONTH({!dateDateToCheck} - 14)), TEXT(MONTH({!dateDateToCheck} - 14))) & "-" & IF(DAY({!dateDateToCheck} - 14) < 10, "0" & TEXT(DAY({!dateDateToCheck} - 14)), TEXT(DAY({!dateDateToCheck} - 14))) & "T22:00:00.000Z"

formulas.name: frmDateToCheck
formulas.expression: TEXT(YEAR({!dateDateToCheck})) & "-" & IF(LEN(TEXT(MONTH({!dateDateToCheck}))) = 1, "0" & TEXT(MONTH({!dateDateToCheck})), TEXT(MONTH({!dateDateToCheck}))) & "-" & IF(LEN(TEXT(DAY({!dateDateToCheck}))) = 1, "0" & TEXT(DAY({!dateDateToCheck})), TEXT(DAY({!dateDateToCheck})))

fields.name: Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong...


Error message:

{!CustomError}

fields.name: boolUseDefaultProximity
fields.helpText:
Description:

By default, we search for Hosts with no events within {!numProximityFilter} days of the day you enter (both before and after).


By unchecking this box, you can manually set the filter.


Result Quality

  • Reducing the number
    • Returns more Hosts
    • Increases risk of having to cancel the event later on
  • Increasing the number
    • Returns fewer hosts
    • Decreases the risk of having to cancel the event later on

fields.name: displayDecideHostsToPlot
fields.fieldText:
Available Hosts


Here is a list of all available Hosts on the selected date.

Mark the ones you want to plot on the map.

fields.name: headerScreen2
fields.fieldText:
Success


Available hosts added for


{!dateDateToCheck}


If you're unsure how to display them on the map, follow the guide below.

textTemplates.name: txtQueryForCampaigns
textTemplates.text: FROM Campaign WHERE Id != '' AND (Start__c >= {!frm14DaysBeforeCheckDate}) AND (Start__c <= {!frm14DaysAfterCheckDate}) AND (Status != 'Cancelled') AND (Market_Unit__c = '{!MarketUnit}')

textTemplates.name: txtQueryForHosts
textTemplates.text: FROM Hosts__c WHERE Id != '' AND (Market_Unit__c = '{!MarketUnit}') AND (Dynamic_Availability_Checker__c = {!frmDateToCheck})
